text: Nothing in this chapter shall restrict the authority of the Mayor of the District of Columbia to inspect, condemn, denature, destroy, seize, or remove food for human consumption pursuant to § 22-2903.
historical:
Prior Codifications

1981 Ed., § 33-802.

Legislative History of Laws

For legislative history of D.C. Law 4-39, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 48-301.

DC CODE § 48-302

Current through December 11, 2012
